com.marcospassos.phpserializer

Interface TypeAdapter<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type of object supported.
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ArrayAdapter, BooleanAdapter, DoubleAdapter, IntegerAdapter, ListAdapter, MapAdapter, ObjectAdapter, ReferableObjectAdapter, StringAdapter

    public interface TypeAdapter<T>
    Writes Java objects in PHP's Serialization format.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Marcos Passos

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void write(T value, Writer writer, Context context)
      Encodes the specified value in PHP's Serialization format.

    • Method Detail

      • write

        void write(T value,
           Writer writer,
           Context context)
        Encodes the specified value in PHP's Serialization format.
        Parameters:
        value - The value to write.
        writer - The writer.
        context - The serialization context.
